mapper.insert: insert into VACATION (START_TIME, END_TIME, USER_ID, INSERT_TIME, EDITOR, EDIT_TIME, TYPE, APPROVAL_AUTHORITY) values (#{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{userId}, now(), #{editor}, now(), #{type}, #{approvalAuthority})
mapper.select: select VACATION_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME, STATUS, USER_ID, TYPE, APPROVAL_AUTHORITY from VACATION where DELETE_STATUS = 0 and USER_ID = #{userId} order by INSERT_TIME DESC
select VACATION_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME, STATUS, USER_ID, TYPE, APPROVAL_AUTHORITY from VACATION where DELETE_STATUS = 0 and APPROVAL_AUTHORITY = #{userId} and STATUS = 0 ORDER by INSERT_TIME DESC
select VACATION_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME, STATUS, USER_ID, TYPE, APPROVAL_AUTHORITY from VACATION where DELETE_STATUS = 0 and VACATION_ID = #{vacationId}
